definitions.meaning: (of children, parents etc) at one's side

sentences.translation: He took his son with him to his side.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在演出中，她的父母坐在舞台跟前，一直为她加油。
sentences.traditionalText: 在演出中，她的父母坐在舞台跟前，一直為她加油。
sentences.pinyin: Zài yǎnchū zhōng, tā de fùmǔ zuò zài wǔtái gēn qián, yīzhí wèi tā jiāyóu.
sentences.translation: During the performance, her parents sat at the front of the stage, cheering her on all the time.
